person.name: Gerrit W. Gong
person.description: Elder Gerrit W. Gong was sustained a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 3, 2010, at the age of 56. At the time of his call, he had been serving as a member of the Fifth Quorum of the Seventy in the Utah South Area. He is currently serving in the Asia Area Presidency.
